Union_City.KFAX:
KFAX (1100 kHz) is a commercial AM radio station licensed to San Francisco, California, and heard around the Bay Area. As of 2014, the station is owned by Salem Media Group and programs a Christian radio teaching and talk format.
The studios and offices are on Liberty Street in Fremont and the transmitter is Hayward near the San Mateo–Hayward Bridge.
